Introduction

Kotone is a Japanese rapper, dancer, and singer under MODHAUS.

On July 7, 2021, Kotone was announced as a contestant on Mnet's survival show "Girls Planet 999". She was supposed to be eliminated during the second round of eliminations but was saved by the planet masters. Kotone was eliminated from the show during the eleventh episode.

Kotone was introduced as the eleventh member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS on January 2, 2023. She first debuted with the sub-unit EVOLution on October 11, 2023, with the mini album "⟡ (MUJUK)". Kotone then made her debut with tripleS on May 8, 2024, with the album "ASSEMBLE24".

As a member of tripleS, Kotone was placed in the sub-units EVOLution, Visionary Vision, and Hatchi!.

Kotone is a fan of the girl group LOONA. Her bias is member HyeJu.

Kotone's hobbies include sleeping, shopping, and gaming.

Kotone's nicknames are 'Koto', 'Tone', 'Ko jjang', 'Kota' and 'Nene'.
…
4
Kotone enjoys watching anime with fellow member NaKyoung.

5
Kotone has been watching iCarly to improve her English. A word she has recently learned is "Dude", who she now says often to her friends.
…
6
Kuromi, Peckle and Lloromannic from Hello Kitty and Zoroark from Pokémon are among Kotone's favorite fictional characters.

7
The members Kotone respects the most are YooYeon and Mayu.

When she was little, Kotone liked the cash register in stores, so she got one as a Christmas gift.
…
9
Since she was originally a fan herself, Kotone is confident that she knows how to make everyone happy. She'll continue to cherish her fans as long as they are by her side.

Some of Kotone's favorite foods are Tteokgalbi, cream Tteokbokki and sweet potato pizza.
